note: Fiscal multiplier estimates from published research

healthcare.note: Each $1 of healthcare spending generates $1.50 in economic activity

education.source: CBO estimates of education spending multiplier
education.note: Education spending has moderate near-term multiplier, higher long-term returns

food_assistance.note: Food assistance has high multiplier due to high MPC of recipients

conditions_note: Multipliers are higher during recessions and lower during expansions. Baseline assumes normal economic conditions.
